body_html:
Looking more closely at the stack trace above, it's clear that the error is thrown while reading an image from disk:
with tf.gfile.FastGFile(image.filename, "r") as f:
encoded_image = f.read()

It sounds like you've run out of memory. Is there any way you can increase that on your cloud instance?

It sounds like you've run out of memory. Is there any way you can increase that on your cloud instance?
body:
Looking more closely at the stack trace above, it's clear that the error is thrown while reading an image from disk:
  with tf.gfile.FastGFile(image.filename, "r") as f:
    encoded_image = f.read()

It sounds like you've run out of memory. Is there any way you can increase that on your cloud instance?
